This new updates has quite some playability bugs, like multiple blackouts in set pieces, corners or even after you score a goal and such. There's also a problem that things get very laggy with heavy frame chops during replays, which also affects the gameplay afterwards. I hope the next patch comes very soon since this new update is very unstable and almost unplayable. Appreciate the new features a bit though, even when the bugs ruin things. Gave a 3 stars since I still have some faith in Konami

(I tried the game on a ios and the problem is not there but on other android it's still there.) The teammate AI is terrible as well, they don't go forward when it's needed. Please, fix it! It's a really fun game!

1 star. Would give it 0 if I could. The controls are horrible. The passing is slow and you can't build any momentum. Dribbling feels like driving a truck. Takes ages for players to turn. Players look lost whenever they lose possession and they don't try to win it back. Defenders just walk right past attackers without even tackling. The menus are just cramped into one page. Many good game modes removed. They objectives give basically nothing in return. Buggy and scripted. WOAT pes game.

There are many problems here. Like, while kicking it keeps asking me how to kick. I have faced lagging issue when I was playing international cup. This game needs more development. It would be nice if all the settings could be saved and the World Cup could be played both computer and online. One more thing, if the player's speed was given to the left joystick. For example, if you pull the joystick slowly, the player will run slowly, and if you pull it hard, it will run fast.

I think it is one of the best games , I have ever played. There can be some additions. For example. There should be a feature which tells about the stats of that player with my team. There should be representation when there is substitution. There should be more tournaments except the casual matches which could provide us with trophies and boots.
